title: Java Fullstack Developer
description:
**Key Skills Required**
* Programming Languages: Java (8, 11, 21\\)
* Frameworks: Spring (Core, Boot, MVC), Spring Boot Microservices
* Front\\-End: ReactJS, Java Swing
* ORM: Hibernate
* Build \\& Testing Tools: Maven, JUnit, Mockito
* CI/CD \\& Version Control: Jenkins, Git, Jira
* Cloud Platforms: AWS (preferred) or equivalent
* Other Technologies: OSGi Bundles
* Emerging Tech Exposure: Agentic AI concepts, MCP Servers, AI Tools


**Roles \\& Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain scalable backend applications using Java, Spring Boot, and Microservices architecture.
* Build and enhance UI components with ReactJS and Java Swing as required.
* Write and maintain unit and integration tests using JUnit and Mockito to ensure code quality.
* Create responsive, dynamic, and cross\\-browser compatible front\\-end interfaces.
* Work with state management tools like Redux or Context API.
* Integrate front\\-end components with RESTful APIs and ensure seamless communication between backend and frontend systems.
* Manage builds and dependencies using Maven.
* Automate build and deployment processes using Jenkins for CI/CD pipelines.
* Use Git for version control and Jira for issue tracking and project management.
* Deploy and maintain applications on AWS Cloud (preferred) or other cloud environments.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate AI solutions leveraging Agentic AI concepts, MCP servers, and AI tools.

title: Machine Learning/AI Engineer
description:
**Summary:**
 You would get chance to design and implement scalable solutions to optimize fraud detection systems, spanning model development, feature engineering, and rule\\-based systems. You will collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams, including data scientists, engineers, and product managers, to ensure our platform sets a new global standard for efficacy and innovation.
   

 You will address critical business challenges, develop advanced automation frameworks, and integrate cutting\\-edge machine learning techniques to enhance decision\\-making capabilities. By joining us, you will not only contribute to fraud detection efforts but leave a lasting impact on the financial security of millions of users around the globe.
   

  

**Responsibilities:** 


* Redesign and optimize MLOps and decision platform for fraud detection
* Architect large\\-scale big\\-data infrastructure to enable use of cutting\\-edge machine learning models for real\\-time fraud prevention.
* Collaborate with data scientists and platform engineers to automate workflow
* Provide solutions that ensure compliance, security, and maintainability across the fraud detection ecosystem.
* Work with high\\-dimensional datasets and leverage tools like Python, PySpark, and Big Query to develop robust workflows for fraud signal detection.
* Standardize rules and decision processes while enabling dynamic rule updates and analytics within the fraud detection platform.
* Collaborate across multidisciplinary teams in engineering, product development, and data science to scale solutions globally.
* Will work with Core Automation team’s Tech leads/managers closely
* Rebuild together with Engineer teams on our next generation risk platform (NGRP)
* We have a tight timeline to meet decision engine adoption plan
* You will be part of our pioneer working team launching our NGRP




**Requirements:** 


* At least 6 years above
* MS above
* STEM only
* Python code, Big Query
* Understand the production systems architect overview




  
   

 \\#AditiIndia
   

 \\#25\\-23290

title: AI/ML Engineer
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and deploy scalable machine learning models for real\\-world applications.
* Work on Generative AI\\-based solutions such as chatbots using RAG approaches.
* Implement and optimize product matching, image recognition, and NLP/LLM solutions.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to integrate AI/ML solutions into existing products and workflows.
* Develop and maintain ML pipelines using MLflow, Kubeflow, or similar frameworks.
* Write and optimize SQL queries for data manipulation and analysis.
* Ensure model performance, scalability, and maintainability.
* Stay current with advancements in AI/ML, deep learning, and Gen AI frameworks.


**Required Skills \\& Experience**
* 2\\+ years of hands\\-on experience as an ML Engineer, Data Scientist, or AI Developer.
* Proficiency in Python (functions, debugging, data manipulation, system design principles).
* Strong understanding of ML algorithms, techniques, and best practices.
* Experience with Databricks, Azure AI Services, and other ML/cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP).
* Proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, and Scikit\\-learn.
* Expertise in SQL (aggregations, joins, complex queries).
* Hands\\-on experience in Generative AI frameworks such as LangChain, LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, etc.
* Familiarity with LLMs (GPT, BERT, etc.) and RAG\\-based chatbot development.
* Strong understanding of MLOps tools like MLflow or Kubeflow.


**Preferred Skills**
* Experience in model optimization and performance tuning.
* Familiarity with product integration and deployment on cloud environments.
* Knowledge of version control (Git) and Agile development practices.

title: Java Backend Developer
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain Java/J2EE\\-based applications and RESTful APIs.
* Implement scalable microservices and ensure system reliability and performance.
* Develop and automate unit and integration tests to ensure high\\-quality code.
* Deploy and manage containerized applications using Kubernetes, Docker, or AWS ECS/EKS.

* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams following Agile methodologies.

**Must\\-Have Skills**

title: Software Developer 3
description:
**Job Description**
**Big Data Service Team @ Oracle Analytics**
 OCI is leading the transformation to cloud\\-native Big Data technologies in our hyper\\-scale, multi\\-tenant cloud, deployed in more than 20 regions worldwide. OCI is committed to providing the best in cloud services that meet the needs of our customers, who are tackling some of the world's biggest challenges.
   

  

 The Big Data Service team’s charter is to offer a managed, cloud\\-native Big Data Service focused on large\\-scale data processing and analytics on unstructured data stored in data lakes and managing the data in data lakes. The service work scope encompasses good integration with OCI’s native infrastructure (security, cloud, storage, etc.) and deep integration with other relevant cloud\\-native services in OCI (like Oracle Kubernetes, Data Catalog, ADW, etc.). It includes doing cloud\\-native ways of doing service level patching \\& upgrades and maintaining high availability of the service in the face of random failures \\& planned downtimes in the underlying infrastructure (e.g., for things like patching the Linux kernels to take care of a security vulnerability).
   

  

 We are interested in senior engineers with expertise and passion for solving difficult problems in distributed systems and highly available services. At Oracle, you can help, shape, design, and build innovative new systems from the ground up. These are exciting times in our space \\- we are growing fast, still at an early stage, and working on ambitious new initiatives. Engineers at any level can have significant technical and business impact.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
**Desired Skills and Experience**
* Deep understanding of how distributed resilient software is built and deployed.
* Prior experience in building, or contributing to, distributed data\\-intensive systems
* Experience delivering and operating large\\-scale, highly available distributed systems.
* Experience with larger projects (large codebases)
* Experience with open\\-source software in the Big Data ecosystem
* Experience at an organization with strong operational/dev\\-ops culture
* Expertise in coding in Java or Scala with emphasis on tuning/optimization
* Good software engineering skills:
+ know how to write clean, testable, and maintainable code
+ write documentation
+ understanding of simple and robust designs, including designing APIs

* Bonus
+ Deep understanding of Java and JVM mechanics
+ Interested in speaking about their work, internally and externally, or writing articles

* BS in Computer Science or a related technical field or equivalent practical experience.
* Solid foundation in data structures, algorithms, and software design with strong analytical and debugging skills.
* Passion for learning and always improving yourself and the team around you


**What to Expect from the Job**
* Working on distributed data\\-intensive systems, often as part of open\\-source communities.
* Taking ownership of critical parts of the cloud service, including shaping its direction.
* Code, integrate, and operationalize open and closed source data ecosystem components for Oracle cloud service offerings
* Becoming an active member of the Apache open\\-source community when working on open\\-source components
* Optionally: Presenting work at conferences, meetups, or via articles.
* Working with, and supporting customers/users of the cloud service
* Design, develop, troubleshoot, and debug software programs for databases, applications, tools, networks, etc.


**Qualifications**
 Career Level \\- IC3
   

  

**About Us**
 As a world leader in cloud solutions, Oracle uses tomorrow’s technology to tackle today’s challenges. We’ve partnered with industry\\-leaders in almost every sector—and continue to thrive after 40\\+ years of change by operating with integrity.
   

  

 We know that true innovation starts when everyone is empowered to contribute. That’s why we’re committed to growing an inclusive workforce that promotes opportunities for all.
   

  

 Oracle careers open the door to global opportunities where work\\-life balance flourishes. We offer competitive benefits based on parity and consistency and support our people with flexible medical, life insurance, and retirement options. We also encourage employees to give back to their communities through our volunteer programs.
   

  

 We’re committed to including people with disabilities at all stages of the employment process. If you require accessibility assistance or accommodation for a disability at any point, let us know by emailing accommodation\\-request\\_mb@oracle.com or by calling \\+1 888 404 2494 in the United States.
   

  

 Oracle is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability and protected veterans’ status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Oracle will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records pursuant to applicable law.

title: Full stack developer(.Net)
description:

title: DevOps / Cloud Engineer
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, build, and maintain High Availability (HA) Kubernetes clusters.
* Work extensively on AWS services such as EC2, VPC, Load Balancers, Auto Scaling, VPC Peering, S3, IAM, SNS, SES, etc.
* Develop automation scripts for EC2 provisioning, Kubernetes upgrades, and automated deployments.
* Manage CNI networking using Calico/Weave.
* Work with API Gateways like Emissary and Envoy.
* Deploy and manage Kafka clusters using the Strimzi Operator.
* Deploy and manage microservices on Kubernetes.
* Monitor, manage, and maintain Development, QA, and Production environments.
* Analyze cloud usage and implement cost optimization strategies.
* Participate in 24/7 production support on a rotational basis.
* Design and implement DevOps automations and lifecycle processes.
* Manage configuration, deployments, and orchestration using Kubernetes/Docker Swarm.
* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins, Argo CD, Bitbucket Pipelines.
* Configure networking including VPN, routing, HTTPS/SSL, and load balancing.
* Support ELK Stack for logging and monitoring.


**Required Skills \\& Technologies**
**Cloud Platforms**
* AWS: VPC, Route 53, EC2, Auto Scaling, ELB, SES, SNS, NAT Gateway, EIP, API Gateway, CloudWatch, CloudFormation, Security Groups, Subnets, ACLs, VPC Peering.


**DevOps \\& CI/CD**
* Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Argo CD, Ansible, GitHub/Bitbucket, Bitbucket Pipelines.


**Artifact Management**
* Nexus (or equivalent)


**Infrastructure as Code (IaC)**
* Terraform, Crossplane, or CloudFormation


**Monitoring \\& Logging**
* ELK Stack, Prometheus, Grafana, CloudWatch


**Scripting \\& OS**
* Strong Shell scripting (Bash) on Linux/Ubuntu


**Networking**
* VPN configuration, routing, load balancing, HTTPS/SSL


**Experience Required**
* 3\\+ years in Configuration Management and CI/CD implementation
* 2\\-4 years in Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Linux scripting
* 3\\+ years in Shell scripting and cloud automation (AWS/Azure)
* 2\\+ years handling Production cloud environments
* Hands\\-on experience with Terraform/Crossplane/CloudFormation
* Experience with Elasticsearch clustering and HTTPS/SSL setup
* Strong communication and troubleshooting skills


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Exposure to multi\\-cloud (AWS/Azure)
* Experience in cloud cost optimization \\& scaling
* Familiarity with secure DevOps practices
* Basic understanding of AI/LLM concepts (added advantage)

 of experience in

 .

 , data flows, and integration fundamentals.

title: FinOps Engineer
description:
Our team members are at the heart of everything we do. At Cencora, we are united in our responsibility to create healthier futures, and every person here is essential to us being able to deliver on that purpose. If you want to make a difference at the center of health, come join our innovative company and help us improve the lives of people and animals everywhere. Apply today!
   

  

**Job Details**
**Position can be performed virtually / remote**
 The FinOps Engineer is pivotal to advancing the adoption of public cloud services at Cencora. The successful candidate will serve as a technical expert, driving FinOps initiatives aimed at enhancing cloud efficiency. This role will involve collaboration with various stakeholders to optimize public cloud consumption and promote the growth of public cloud services within the organization.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Plan, build, test, and implement solutions that support FinOps initiatives focused on cloud efficiency.
* Identify opportunities for process improvement and increased efficiency through automation and AI, aligned with business needs and objectives.
* Maintain up\\-to\\-date knowledge of public cloud optimization, regulations, policies, and procedures, contributing to the development of optimization policies and guidelines.
* Develop and execute comprehensive test plans to validate the functionality and performance of automated systems.
* Design, develop, and integrate automated solutions with existing systems and platforms to ensure seamless operations.
* Monitor and conduct regular maintenance on automated solutions to ensure optimal functionality.
* Design and implement Business Intelligence (BI) solutions, supporting data transformation and ensuring data quality through ETL processes.
* Stay informed about the latest automation technologies and industry trends to recommend innovative tools and practices, particularly in the realm of AI solutions.
* Demonstrate effective oral and written communication skills when addressing issues with colleagues and presenting team work.
* Create, define, and maintain detailed documentation of operating procedures, automation processes, scripts, and configurations.
* Ensure that design and execution align with best practices regarding infrastructure and security.
* Write and maintain scripts and code necessary for automation using programming languages such as Python, Java, or C\\#.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to meet critical deadlines, conducting thorough analyses and employing creative thinking to achieve objectives.
* Participate in special projects as required.
* Perform other duties as assigned.


**Requirements And Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
* A minimum of 4 years of experience in an operational role with a cloud platform (Azure, AWS, GCP) in a technical capacity.
* Proven expertise in cloud optimization is essential.
* Business Intelligence or Data Analytics skills are preferred.
* Familiarity with FinOps concepts or possession of FinOps Certifications is preferred.
* Exceptional written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to engage effectively with both technical and non\\-technical stakeholders to coordinate activities and achieve goals.
* Strong analytical, problem\\-solving, and multi\\-tasking capabilities.
* A strong desire for continuous learning and professional growth.
* A proactive approach to contributing to organizational automation process improvements and best practices.
* Demonstrated teamwork and collaboration skills, with experience fulfilling multiple roles within a team environment.


**Education**
***EDUCATIONAL QUALIFICATIONS:***
* Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or any other related discipline or equivalent related experience.


**Preferred Certifications**
* Microsoft IT Certifications e.g. Certified Engineer, Microsoft Certified IT Professional
* Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP)
* Application/Infrastructure/Enterprise Architect Training and Certification, e.g. TOGAF
* Cloud Infrastructure Certification e.g. Azure Solution Architect Expert Certification
* Networking, Network convergence \\& Network Security \\& Compliance (CCNA)
* Enterprise IT Certification e.g. CGEIT


**Work Experience**
* 4 \\+ years of directly\\-related or relevant experience, preferably in IT Infrastructure design.


**Skills \\& Knowledge**
**Behavioral Skills:**
* Assertiveness
* Creativity \\& Innovation
* Critical Thinking
* Impact and Influencing
* Multitasking
* Prioritization and Organization


**Technical Skills**
* IT Regulatory Compliance like SOX Compliance
* Data Management
* Data Security
* IT Infrastructure Management
* IT Support like Software \\& Hardware Installation, Troubleshooting
* Server Management
* Service Level Maintenance
* Technical Documentation


**Tools Knowledge**
* Citrix technologies like XenDesktop, XenApp, XenServer
* Cloud Computing Tools like AWS, Azure, Google cloud
* Customer Relationship Management (CRM) Systems like Salesforce Marketing Cloud, Sales Cloud
* Database Software like RDBMS, DB2, Oracle, MS SQL
* Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) Systems like Sage, ASW, SAP
* Operating Systems \\& Servers like Windows, Linux, Citrix, IBM, Oracle, SQL
* Microsoft Office Suite
* Middleware nodes \\& servers like Websphere, Jboss
* Ticket/Complaint Management Systems
* Virtualization Tools like VMware, vSphere or MS Hyper\\-V
* Internet Protocols like DNS, HTTP, LDAP, SMTP, Easy DNS, No IP


******What Cencora offers******
 Benefit offerings outside the US may vary by country and will be aligned to local market practice. The eligibility and effective date may differ for some benefits and for team members covered under collective bargaining agreements.
   

  

 Full time
   

  

******Affiliated Companies******
 Affiliated Companies: CENCORA BUSINESS SERVICES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
   

  

********Equal Employment Opportunity********
 Cencora is committed to providing equal employment opportunity without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, genetic information, national origin, age, disability, veteran status or membership in any other class protected by federal, state or local law.
   

  

 The company’s continued success depends on the full and effective utilization of qualified individuals. Therefore, harassment is prohibited and all matters related to recruiting, training, compensation, benefits, promotions and transfers comply with equal opportunity principles and are non\\-discriminatory.
   

  

 Cencora is committed to providing reasonable accommodations to individuals with disabilities during the employment process which are consistent with legal requirements. If you wish to request an accommodation while seeking employment, please call 888\\.692\\.2272 or email hrsc@cencora.com. We will make accommodation determinations on a request\\-by\\-request basis. Messages and emails regarding anything other than accommodations requests will not be returned

title: Technical Lead-App Development
description:
Area(s) of responsibility
   

  

**Reliability Engineer**
* Ensure the dependability and scalability of enterprise\\-scale applications.
* Be a member of DevOps teams in shared responsibility for the reliability of these applications and associated platforms.
* Develop the reliability process to ensure the highest level of systems availability, stability, security and performance, including maintenance and support, root cause analysis, systems validation, performance tuning and capacity management.
* Have dedicated time for creating software that improves the reliability of systems in production, fixing issues, and responding to incidents/on\\-call events.
* Help in the design and implementation of monitoring, alerting and appropriate metrics to track and report adherence to service SLOs and SLAs, performance and operational efficiency.
* Drive technical innovation and efficiency in application and infrastructure operations via simplification and automation.
* Coordinate between infrastructure, platform and application subject matter experts to promote reliability efforts through communication and best practice sharing.
* Support a root cause analysis program that will lead to reduced downtime, increased resiliency and a culture of continuous improvement.


**Technology Skills**
* APM tools knowledge – New Relic – service maps, tracing, creating dashboards, custom events and queries, monitoring – resources, JVM heap / thread pools etc, alerting
* Knowledge of spring boot applications development \\& monitoring, tuning – JVM params, application params etc.
* Knowledge of Splunk and Splunk queries, creating Splunk dashboards
* DevOps pipelines – bitbucket, cloudbees, Amazon cloud,
* Knowledge of distributed tracing frameworks like Jaeger

Roles \\& Responsibilities: \\- Expected to perform independently and become an SME. \\- Required active participation/contribution in team discussions. \\- Contribute in providing solutions to work related problems. \\- Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to gather requirements and translate them into technical specifications. \\- Conduct code reviews to ensure adherence to best practices and coding standards. title: Senior Android Developer
description:
**Key Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain advanced Android applications using Kotlin and Java.
* Implement MVVM / Clean Architecture using Jetpack Components, Compose, LiveData, and Hilt/Dagger.
* Integrate RESTful APIs, third\\-party SDKs (Firebase, Google Play Services, Analytics, Ads), and ensure app security.
* Optimize app performance across devices and OS versions.
* Build reusable components and frameworks for scalability and maintainability.
* Conduct code reviews, write unit tests, and perform performance profiling.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams (Product, Design, QA, Backend) to deliver high\\-quality features.
* Participate in Agile ceremonies\\-sprint planning, daily stand\\-ups, retrospectives.
* Stay updated with emerging Android trends and best practices.


**Required Skills \\& Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field.
* 6\\+ years of Android development experience.
* Proficient in Kotlin, Java, and the Android SDK.
* Hands\\-on with Jetpack Compose, Coroutines, Hilt, ViewModel, and Room.
* Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, Bitbucket, Azure DevOps) and Git.
* Strong knowledge of RESTful APIs, Retrofit/OkHttp, and app security (encryption, SSL pinning).
* Proven experience publishing and maintaining apps on the Google Play Store.
* Excellent debugging, problem\\-solving, and leadership skills.

title: Java- React JS Full Stack Lead
description:
Minimum 8 years of experience in software development and 5 years as a Software Architecture Design and Java and ReactJs Fullstack development as Technical lead.
   

  

 Java
   

  

 Proficient in Java, Spring Boot, SQL, NoSQL, Docker, and Kubernetes.
   

  

 Strong understanding of microservices architecture and scalable system design.
   

  

 Experience in designing and implementing Non\\-Functional Requirements (NFRs) like scalability, performance, and security.
   

  

 Expertise in at least one cloud platform (AWS, GCP, Azure) with hands\\-on experience in cloud services.
   

  

 Ability to set up and manage CI/CD pipelines independently.
   

  

 Skilled in monolithic to microservices migration strategies.
   

  

 Capable of handling high data volumes and designing analytics dashboards using analytical databases.
   

  

 Ability to work as an individual contributor while managing and mentoring a team.
   

  

 Strong client management skills to gather requirements and present system architectures.
   

  

 Experience in building and deploying distributed systems for enterprise\\-grade applications.
   

  

 Knowledge of monitoring tools like Prometheus and Grafana is an advantage.
   

  

 Cloud certifications (AWS, Azure, GCP) are preferred.
   

  

 Strong leadership, communication, and problem\\-solving skills.
   

  

 Able to understand the IBM WebSphere and IBM Http server functionalities
   

  

 React JS
   

  

 Software Development
   

  

* Having 4\\+ years of experience on React is a MUST
* Working with latest React and Redux versions
* Having experience in Both JavaScript as well as Typescript (MUST)
* Unit Testing knowledge with JEST and RTL is a MUST
* Having experience working with projects from inception, (So that we can decide to either go with Manual Project setup or with create react app command)
* Knowledge of Java (Good to have)


 Location: Bangalore
